message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think 60/40 is a good starting point, considering the initial value of the money. Let's see if you can do better.
Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I suggest an equal split of the $100. This maintains fairness and ensures both of us receive an equivalent amount.
